languages.text: "Вот что, ван Калокс, зарубите себе на носу: будете морочить Лорд-капитану голову — я не посмотрю ни на какую Инквизицию и буду разбираться с вами лично".
"Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."
languages.original_text: "Вот что, ван Калокс, зарубите себе на носу: будете морочить Лорд-капитану голову — я не посмотрю ни на какую Инквизицию и буду разбираться с вами лично".

traits.locale_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."
"Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."
"Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."
"Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

languages.text: “让我来告诉你是怎么回事吧，冯·卡洛克斯。仔细听好了，如果你胆敢对舰长大人始乱终弃，就算你逃得过审判庭的审判，也别想逃过我的审判。”
languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

traits.locale_text: “让我来告诉你是怎么回事吧，冯·卡洛克斯。仔细听好了，如果你胆敢对舰长大人始乱终弃，就算你逃得过审判庭的审判，也别想逃过我的审判。”

languages.text: « Je vais vous dire une bonne chose, van Calox, et je vous conseille de prendre mes paroles au sérieux : si vous faites souffrir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, ce n'est pas devant l'Inquisition que vous devrez en répondre... mais devant moi. »
languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous dire une bonne chose, van Calox, et je vous conseille de prendre mes paroles au sérieux : si vous faites souffrir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, ce n'est pas devant l'Inquisition que vous devrez en répondre... mais devant moi. »

languages.text: «Van Calox, escuche bien: como haga daño a la Lord Capitán, no responderá ante la Inquisición: responderá ante mí».
languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

traits.locale_text: «Van Calox, escuche bien: como haga daño a la Lord Capitán, no responderá ante la Inquisición: responderá ante mí».

languages.text: 「いいですか、ヴァン・カロックス、よく覚えておいてください。もしロード・キャプテンに何かしたら、異端審問庁には応じませんよ。そしてあなたには答えてもらいましょう」
languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

traits.locale_text: 「いいですか、ヴァン・カロックス、よく覚えておいてください。もしロード・キャプテンに何かしたら、異端審問庁には応じませんよ。そしてあなたには答えてもらいましょう」

languages.text: "Ich sage Euch was, van Calox, und merkt es Euch gut: Wenn Ihr mit dem Lord Captain spielt, bekommt Ihr es nicht mit der Inquisition zu tun ... sondern mit mir."
languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sage Euch was, van Calox, und merkt es Euch gut: Wenn Ihr mit dem Lord Captain spielt, bekommt Ihr es nicht mit der Inquisition zu tun ... sondern mit mir."

languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

languages.text: "Bak, peşinen söylüyorum van Calox: Lord Kaptan'a bir yanlışın olursa Engizisyon'dan değil, benden çekeceğin var."
languages.original_text: "Tell you what, van Calox, let this sink in: if you mess the Lord Captain around, you will not answer to the Inquisition — you will answer to me."

traits.locale_text: "Bak, peşinen söylüyorum van Calox: Lord Kaptan'a bir yanlışın olursa Engizisyon'dan değil, benden çekeceğin var."
